briefTitle: Vinorelbine Metronomic Chemotherapy Combined With Hypofractionated Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2 for Treatment of Advanced Refractory Non-small Cell Lung Cancer and Breast Cancer(PRaG 6.0)
officialTitle: Vinorelbine Metronomic Chemotherapy Combined With Hypofractionated Radiotherapy, PD-1/PD-L1 Inhibitor Sequential GM-CSF and IL-2 for Treatment of Advanced Refractory Non-small Cell Lung Cancer and Breast Cancer (PRaG 6.0)
